name: William's Ordeal
description:
The Game is still in Alpha page, you can check the websit for updates.

The Game basically is a visual novel documentary about how the game industry has started, I tried to write a detailed doc with facts but found, after I spend around 3 months of research, many resources collide, has faulty names, dates and locations, give credit to different people and groups, people memory fail them and a lot of falsies. It isn’t easy to find the truth, so what to do? Here it hit me; what if I make a game that re-creates the events which formed the industry and try to bring the most accurate facts without being biased to any side? And allow the player to explore different info and ask about them.
